metadata.title: USN-4622-1 -- OpenLDAP vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that OpenLDAP incorrectly handled certain network packets. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause OpenLDAP to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4622-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libldap-2.4-2 - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.4 libldap-common - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.4 slapd-contrib - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.4 slapi-dev - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.4 ldap-utils - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.4 libldap2-dev - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.4 slapd-smbk5pwd - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.4 slapd - 2.4.49+dfsg-2ubuntu1.4 No subscription required
